commandList.intro: There is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind
commands: - To set up a writing sprint, use **/sprint**
- To opt-in to a sprint, use the **'Join this sprint'** button
- To be notified of every sprint, use **/sprintrole**
- To stop being notified of every sprint, use **/removesprintrole**
- To cancel a sprint, use the **'Cancel sprint'** button or **/cancelsprint**. You can cancel sprints you've started, and admins with the manage messages permission can cancel any sprint
- To get synonyms for a word, use **/synonym**
- To get antonyms for a word, use **/antonym**
- To get rhymes for a word, use **/rhyme**
- To find words associated with a word, use **/related**
- To find adjectives to describe a noun, use **/describe**
- To get an interesting photo for inspiration, use **/inspire**
commandList.deprecation: The old ! commands have been deprecated because Discord will soon be restricting the ability of bots to access the content of user messages. The new slash commands work without needing to read your messages. For more information, see [this article](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/4410940809111).

noResult: Little words that broke up the thought and dismembered it said nothing...
addRole: we have the habit of freedom and the courage to write exactly what we think
removeRole: and I thought how it is worse, perhaps, to be locked in
joinSprint: so to work, even in poverty and obscurity, is worth while
